title: Number of backlogs one can carry
content: This sem was a disaster for me where i might be getting a backlog in every subject cuz i fell horribly sick right before , does anyone know if there is any rule that wont let me go to 4th sem?

comments.body: I don't think there is a limit. For my batch atleast, you could fail in every course and still make it to the next semester. You'll have to clear all your backlogs if you want to be eligible for placements (and your degree) though.

You can carry a maximum of 24 credits I think. If your backlogs have over 24 credits, then you won't be going to tje next semester and would have to wait until the next semester's ESA. 3rd sem I think has 22 credits in total + a 2 credit special topic. That's right on the edge of 24 credits but I don't think you'd fail in all of them bro, hope for the best ðŸ¤ž
Wait so if i do get them , then i will have to wait till next sem and will start fourth sem when my peers are in fifth sem?
